name: Pre-Hack & Chill with Yellow
short_description: A curated, off-the-record gathering of builders for real conversations about Web3 innovations.
description:
Ready to meet top minds building the future of Web3?

Join us for an evening with developers, protocol architects, and core contributors working on the most exciting innovations in Web3.

Pre-Hack Dev Meetup isn't your average tech event. It's a curated, off-the-record gathering of builders who want real conversations, not slide decks. Expect beers & snacks, good energy, unfiltered ideas, and a chance to meet the people behind Yellow, including our Co-founder and Chief Architect, Louis Bellet.
